Literature.Title: Design and synthesis of amphiphilic alpha-helical model peptides with systematically varied hydrophobic-hydrophilic balance and their interaction with lipid- and bio-membranes.
Literature.Author: Kiyota T, Lee S, Sugihara G

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Staphylococcus aureus FDA 209P(MIC=>100µg/ml),Bacillus subtilis PCI 219(MIC=>100µg/ml),Escherichia coli NIHJ JC-2(MIC=>100µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa U-31(MIC=>100µg/ml)
